description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Machinist and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Ultimate Fire：Concentrate your fire to launch a piercing shot that deals huge damage to all foes up to 6 tiles ahead of you.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Machinist”
